DOC.brief_title: Acceptability Hepatitis B Vaccination General Practitioners Paediatricians
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study assess acceptability Hepatitis B immunization among general practitioner open-care paediatrician . This national , repeat transversal epidemiological study two data measurement time-points period two year ( T1 2009 , T2 2011 , two different sample physician ) order assess immunization practice introduction reimbursement InfanrixHexa® , transition period period follow reimbursement vaccine . At collection time-point , two patient age group investigate : 12-15 month 24-27 month , thus provide measurement before/after reimbursement .
DOC.criteria: • Children eligibility register comply investigator 's immunization policy ( child follow investigator since birth , whose immunization regimen manage investigator ) . Children eligibility register comply investigator 's immunization policy . Refusal patient .
